Công ty Cổ phần Đầu tư Công nghệ KATTECH:
KATTECH Technology Investment Joint Stock Company (abbreviated as \"KATTECH\", formerly known as Hanoi Computer Joint Stock Company, owning the brand KATTECH), was established in September 2001, operating mainly in retail sector of computer products and office equipment. After more than 20 years of development, KATTECH has now become one of the leading brands in the field of information technology products business in Vietnam with a system of large-scale and modern showrooms stretching across the country. from North to South.

Many prestigious organizations continuously appreciate KATTECH with many prestigious awards: Top 50 Famous Vietnamese Brands recognized and awarded by the Vietnam Intellectual Property Association; Top 500 Fastest Growing Enterprises in Vietnam 2021 and 2022 (FAST500), Top 500 Largest Enterprises in Vietnam 2021 (VNR500) recognized and awarded by Vietnam Report, Top 50 Leading Prestigious Brands in Asia 2022 by The Asian Business Development Research Center coordinates with the International Quality Monitoring Organization to select candidates.

With the slogan \"Prestige creates trust\", KATTECH wishes to build the \"trust\" of customers with the best and most outstanding service quality. That is also the guideline for sustainable development that KATTECH aims for.
- Là chuỗi bán lẻ các sản phẩm công nghệ: - Is a leading retail chain of technology products with wide coverage across provinces and cities across the country.
- Với sứ mệnh phụng sự, chúng tôi đem đế: - With the mission of serving, we provide customers with superior experiences and services, thereby creating better values ​​for the community and life.

> Cung cấp phần mềm của các hãng trên t: > Providing software from companies around the world, management software, communication software...

Hướng dẫn thanh toán với Kattech PC: Instructions for payment with Kattech PC
Có 3 hình thức thanh toán, khách hàng có: There are 3 forms of payment, customers can choose the payment method that best suits them
Cách 1: Thanh toán trực tiếp tại cửa hàn: Method 1: Pay directly at our store
Cách 2: Thanh toán khi nhận hàng(COD), k: Method 2: Payment on delivery (COD), customers receive and view the goods at home, then pay directly to the delivery staff
Cách 3: Quý khách thanh toán trước bằng: Method 3: You pay in advance by bank transfer, then we will deliver the goods according to the contractual agreement with you.
Nội dung chuyển khoản ghi rõ họ tên và c: The content of the transfer clearly states your full name and the item to be transferred to. After transferring, we will contact to confirm and proceed with delivery. If after the agreed time we do not deliver or do not respond, you can send a complaint directly to the headquarters address and request compensation if you can prove that the delay affects your business. yours. For customers who want to buy in large quantities for business or wholesale, please contact us directly for a reasonable price policy. And the payment will be made according to the contract. We are committed to transparent, legal business, selling quality and original products.

Đối với sản phẩm bảo hành trên hộp: sản: For products with warranty on the box: the product has a complete box.
Sản phẩm không trầy xước, cấn móp, bể, v: The product is not scratched, dented, broken, broken, or deformed compared to the original.
NHỮNG SẢN PHẨM KHÔNG ĐỦ ĐIỀU KIỆN BẢO HÀ: PRODUCTS THAT ARE NOT ELIGIBLE FOR WARRANTY
Không có tem niêm phong, hoặc bị tẩy xóa: There is no seal, or it has been erased and is no longer in its original form.
Bị tác động vật lý làm trầy xước, cong v: Being scratched, warped, cracked, or broken by physical impacts during use.
Bị hư hỏng do tự ý thảo mở, sửa chữa, th: Damaged due to arbitrarily opening, repairing, or changing the internal product structure without confirmation or supervision by a HACOM technician.
Bị hư hỏng, chập, cháy do sử dụng sai mụ: Damaged, short-circuited, or burned due to misuse, arbitrarily disassembled, or installed without following the instructions for use attached to the product.
Bị hư hỏng do côn trùng xâm nhập (chuột,: Damaged by insects (mice, cockroaches, ants, termites...).
Bị hư hỏng do thiên tai, hỏa hoạn, lụt l: Damaged by natural disasters, fires, floods, lightning strikes, rust, and environmental wear and tear.
Trong 15 ngày đầu khi phát sinh lỗi từ n: During the first 15 days when an error arises from the manufacturer
Sản phẩm phải có đầy đủ vỏ hộp, phụ kiện: The product must have complete packaging and accompanying accessories, without any scratches.
Không vi phạm điều kiện bảo hành khác và: Does not violate other warranty conditions and is not a consumable item.
Không áp dụng với các sản phẩm: CPU, máy: Not applicable to products: CPU, printer, projector, photocopier, fax machine, TV, Apple products, Surface, Sony, Nintendo, Xbox game consoles, liquidation goods, used goods,... ( If there is an error, HACOM will accept product warranty)

Chính sách, quy định chung với Kattech P: General policies and regulations with Kattech PC
1. CHẤP THUẬN CÁC ĐIỀU KIỆN SỬ DỤNG: 1. ACCEPTANCE OF THE CONDITIONS OF USE

Bảo mật thông tin khách hàng với Kattech: Secure customer information with Kattech PC
Khi sử dụng các sản phẩm và dịch vụ của: When using Kattech\'s products and services, you provide information to us and please believe that we always do our best and set strict, private information security principles. Please read the \"Information Privacy Policy\" below to better understand the commitments we make to respect and protect the rights of users.
Chúng tôi thu thập, lưu trữ và xử lý thô: We collect, store and process your information to process transactions, for future notifications, or to provide services. We do not limit the types of personal information we collect: title, name, gender, date of birth, email, address, phone number, fax, payment details, card payment details or payment details. Bank account.
Chúng tôi sẽ dùng thông tin quý khách đã: We will use the information you have provided to process orders, provide services and information requested through the website and according to your requests. Furthermore, we will use such information to manage your account; verify and perform online transactions, audit data downloads from the web; improve website layout and content and adapt it to users; Identify visitors to the website. If you do not want to receive any of our marketing communications, you can opt out at any time.
Các khoản thanh toán trực tuyến sẽ được: Online payments will be processed by our International Network agents. You must only provide us or the Agent or the website with information that is accurate and not misleading and must notify us if there are any changes.
Chi tiết đơn đặt hàng của Quý khách sẽ đ: Your order details will be kept by us, but for security reasons we will not make them available directly. However, users can access information by logging into their account on Kattech\'s website. Here you will see your order details, every detail sent via email. You understand and commit to keeping your personal data confidential and are not allowed to disclose it to third parties. We do not accept any responsibility for incorrect password usage if this is not our fault.
Thông tin của Khách hàng chỉ được sử dụn: Customer information is only used in the management and business activities of the website, as well as provided to parties affiliated with the company. We may also use the information we collect to notify Customers about products or promotional programs available on the Website. In addition, we may contact Customers to receive reviews, opinions and opinions about current products and services or new product launches. Customer\'s personal information may be shared with other companies, but only in cases where it is necessary to meet Customer\'s requests, or used for related purposes.
Công ty có hệ thống máy chủ có khả năng: The company has a server system capable of storing customer information for a minimum of 2 years and a maximum of 10 years. During operations, the company can improve information storage capabilities if necessary. We will delete this data if requested by the Customer.
4. Phương tiện và công cụ để người dùng: 4. Means and tools for users to access and edit their personal data.
Người dùng có thể tiếp cận và chỉnh sửa:
Users can access and edit their personal data directly through the website by logging in to their registered account and editing their personal information and data.

Logging in can be done on computers, phones, or other tools that allow access to the website.
5. Cam kết bảo mật thông tin cá nhân Khá: 5. Commitment to protecting customers\' personal information
Chúng tôi chỉ tập hợp lại các thông tin: We only collect personal information to the extent that it is relevant and necessary for our proper commercial purposes. And we maintain appropriate measures to ensure the safety, integrity, accuracy, and confidentiality of the information users provide. In addition, we also take appropriate measures to ensure that third parties will also ensure the security of the information we provide to them.
Thông tin cá nhân, thông tin riêng của n: Personal information and users\' private information are collected, stored and protected seriously, accurately and securely.
Chúng tôi thiết lập những phần mềm thu t: We set up separate information collection and storage software and are performed solely by our server system and backup server system.
Việc bảo mật các thông tin cá nhân, thôn: The confidentiality of personal and private information of users is absolute and will not be presented to any third party unless requested by a competent State agency.
6. Cơ chế tiếp nhận và giải quyết khiếu: 6. Mechanism for receiving and resolving complaints related to customer personal information
Thành viên có quyền gửi khiếu nại về việ: Members have the right to send complaints about personal information disclosure to third parties to Kattech via our Hotline: North: 0927 884 885 South: 0915 373 527 or via email: contact@kattech.com.vn
Công ty có trách nhiệm thực hiện các biệ: The company is responsible for implementing technical and professional measures to verify the reported content.
Thời gian xử lý phản ánh liên quan đến t: The processing time for feedback related to customer personal information is 20 days.
